topic.title: Where to Find the Best Appetizers in Blacksburg
topic.shortdesc: As a second semester senior, I feel my 4 years eating my way through Blacksburg makes me qualified to be your guide to the best apps in town. All of my recommendations are located in downtown Blacksburg and are all local to Southwest Virginia!

image.alt: Image of downtown Blacksburg, where all of these restaurants are located.

body.p: This list is in no particular order and I love all of these appetizers a lot! No matter which one you chose to try I promise you will not regret it! Enjoy!
